hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Abbas that:a woman vowed to perform Hajj but she died. Her brother came to the Prophet and asked him about that, he said: 'Do yhou think that if your sister owed a debt you wouold pay it off?' He said: 'Yes.' He said: 'Then fulfill the right of Allah, for He is more deserving that His rights should be fulfilled

chapter.ara-name: باب الْحَجِّ عَنِ الْمَيِّتِ الَّذِي، نَذَرَ أَنْ يَحُجَّ،
chapter.eng-name: Hajj On Behalf Of A Deceased Person Who Vowed To Perform Hajj
